page.title: 15SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES.
page.content: Our family read books,go fishing and go on holidays. We play games with cards,watch television,go riding or garden. Sometimes we play snooker and go for walks. I go riding and garden with my mum. I also collect horse brasses,stamps,china horses and china rabbits. My eighteen year old sister collects hat pins and thimbles, as well as postcards. My sixteen year old brother collects beer bottles and records. My parents collect Victorian pictures and glass fruit bowls. People under 25 go to discos, watch television, play with toys or go swimming. If the person is eighteen or over they can go to a pub and drink alchohol. People over 50 do spare time activites like: gardening,sewing, reading and flower arranging. {Elizabeth Day (11)
